title: Looking for someone to practice lane matchups against
body:
Hi guys,
I'm looking for someone who would like to practice lane matchups in 1v1 custom games. For example, right now I'd like to practice {{champion:157}}  vs. {{champion:131}} and {{champion:157}}  vs. {{champion:101}}  (with me as Yas) so I can be more comfortable with the matchups for ranked play. I would be willing to play matchups that you want to learn or get better at. Another thing I've been experimenting with is {{champion:429}} mid so I'd like to play that as well, but I'm mainly focused on learning {{champion:157}} matchups.

I main {{champion:157}}  and {{champion:101}}  so if you guys want to learn to deal with them in laning phase and play their counters ( or someone who's weak against them), reply and I'll friend you.

Btw, I was placed Bronze 1 this season but Silver 2 last season so I'm looking for someone somewhere in that range.

I'm also in the process of learning other mid and top champs ({{champion:7}}  {{champion:103}} {{champion:131}} {{champion:161}}{{champion:120}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:154}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:5}} ) so I can practice those if you'd like to lane against them as well.

replies.body: I wouldn't mind taking you on
Can I play you :0 :D, I would love that :))

I know you dont have this up there, but I'm starting to learn how to play LB. And I would be willing to 1v1 to get some practice in! If you're interested, hit me up and add me in game: VG elfsoamah

Thanks!

~Elf
